The fine  imposed by the learned High Court Judge should stand and default

column2: sentence of three years imprisonment.  We  also order that Rs.  300,000/- be
paid as compensation to the victim of this case.  The said amount is paid in

Open  Court  today.  Therefore,  the  learned  High  Court Judge  is  directed  to
take  steps  to  recover  the  said  fine  of Rs.  5000/-
appellant.  Subject to the said variation in the sentence appeal is dismissed.
